ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] OT Instruments (was complete heal)
ygData.msgSnippet: We also need an organ.  Bonus only to fear songs .... The phaaaaaaaan .. tom of ..... the ..... opera ..... is heeeeeeeeeeeere ... Inside my miiiind!
ygData.messageBody:
We also need an organ. Bonus only to fear songs ....

The phaaaaaaaan
.. tom of
..... the
..... opera
..... is
heeeeeeeeeeeere ...
Inside my miiiind!

Eeeeeeeeeeeeeee!

Unless it is a hand organ ... no bonus .. effect summon begging monkey.

Menuette

----- Original Message -----
From: <JESSICA_WEBBER@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2001 10:55 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] OT Instruments (was complete heal)


>
>
> Windleaf wrote:
> I would kill for a trombone - especially if we had a trombone graphic~!
>
> ***
> If Verant were to implement trombones with graphics we would be obligated
> to get 76 of us together on one server just to march through the most
> populous zones. Let's petition for trombones now! :-)
>
> Other instruments Norrath is lacking:
>
> String: Vilia's Violin - Below a certain string skill level it will
reverse
> any healing effects of songs played.
>
> Percussion: Grand Piano - Weight 500, increases songs by 50% Throw it
> into a weight reducing pack and only whip it out for the Chants, not the
> travelling songs. Nothing like raiding The Hole as a pianist <evil grin>.
>
> Wind: Kelin's Kazoo - increases the knock-back effect of Pixie Strike but
> reverses the effect of Charismatic Carillon, also has a -5 CHA attribute
> and has a strong taunt effect. Mobs WILL hit you in the face when you
play
> this. So might party members.
>
> Brass: Archangel Gabriel's Trumpet - Playing it will bring the server
> down, but wouldn't it still be cool to have?
>
> Peace
> Evulia, 14.8 and crawling, Tunare
>
>
>
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
>
